name: SAUL
description:
"SAUL" is a colorful top-down swarm survival shooter developed in GameMaker: Studio. The base concept was developed in Unity, as an entry for a short game jam here on itch.io. Since then, I've decided to revive/continue the project.

Controls are simple: use WASD to move, space to dash, click to shoot, right-click to throw a bomb.

The current prototype features:

  • Five enemy types
  • A dash ability for quick getaways
  • A bomb powerup for AOE damage
  • A rapid-fire powerup for maximum carnage
  • Five levels of progressing difficulty

Try it out and let me know what you think! :)
